headline.main: U.S. AIR RAID ON TOKYO WITNESSED BY GREW; Ambassador and Other Americans at Embassy Had View

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 31 -- Joseph C. Grew, United States Ambassador to Japan, and members of the embassy staff, it was learned today, had a ringside seat during the United States Army air attack on Tokyo by Brig. Gen. Doolittle and his aviators.
abstract: US raid on Tokyo witnessed by former US Amb to Japan J C Grew and embassy staff members
snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 31 -- Joseph C. Grew, United States Ambassador to Japan, and members of the embassy staff, it was learned today, had a ringside seat during the United States Army air attack on Tokyo by Brig. Gen. Doolittle and his aviators....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
